message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you consider this price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm still hoping to find a way to purchase the product for $100. Could we meet somewhere in between?
